name: Cyclops The Snail's Marvelous Maze Adventure!
name_original: Cyclops The Snail's Marvelous Maze Adventure!
description:
Guide cyclops the snail as they travel around procedurally generated mazes while dodging the enemies attacks!

After every level, you can grade the previous level to help the generator keep things to your taste!

Done for 7DRL challenge 2021.

Featuring the song:

Bleeping Demo by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/7012-bleeping-demo

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
